title: Allrecipes Recipe Scraper
description: Extract recipes from Allrecipes.com with ingredients, instructions, ratings, and nutritional information. Search by recipe name, ingredient, or meal type.

startUrls.title: Start URLs (Optional)
startUrls.description: Array of Allrecipes URLs to scrape. If provided, this overrides the search query. Useful for scraping specific recipe categories or collections.

query.title: Search Query
query.description: Recipe search term (e.g., 'Chicken Pasta', 'Chocolate Cake', 'Vegan Soup'). This will search Allrecipes for matching recipes.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Recipes
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of recipes to extract. Set higher for comprehensive results.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages to Crawl
max_pages.description: Limits the number of search result pages to process. Helps control scraping time and resource usage.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings to avoid rate limiting. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
